toms-video-player.Name: TomS Video Player
toms-video-player.Description: Simply protect your videos from being downloaded 'Directly'.

toms-image-slider.Name: TomS Image Slider
toms-image-slider.Description: Simply Slider block, easy to use, using image url to show the images directly.

toms-social-login.Name: TomS Social Login
toms-social-login.Description: Support Facebook,Google,Paypal,Github,Wechat,QQ,Weibo,Dingtalk accounts to login your wordpress site.

toms-vaptcha.Name: TomS Vaptcha
toms-vaptcha.Description: Gesture captcha —— Easy for human, hard for robots. Protect the login, register, lostpassword and comment forms, support woocommerce, ultimate member, user registration and more popular forms.

toms-pretty-list.Name: TomS Pretty List
toms-pretty-list.Description: Simple and beautiful list block. Support all font icon library and SVG icon.

toms-extra-source.Name: TomS Extra Source
toms-extra-source.Description: An add-on for Toms Video Player.
